section.p: Congratulations on successfully completing your manuscript submission through mySayans! Your contribution is an important step towards advancing research and knowledge in your field. Our editorial team will now begin the process of reviewing your submission. You will receive a confirmation email shortly with a summary of your submission details, along with the attached PDF document for your records. If you need to make any updates or have further inquiries, please refer to the email for instructions or contact our editorial team. We appreciate your dedication to scholarly work and thank you for choosing Sayans Publishers Inc. for your manuscript submission. We're excited to engage with your research and look forward to the possibility of sharing it with the wider academic community. If you have any questions or require assistance at any point in the review process, please feel free to reach out to our team. Thank you once again, and best wishes on your research journey!
